bug.author: EMCP
bug.summary: Docker-compose up not working on Mac OS
bug.description:
Describe the bug Readme.md states to run the following command to start the application via docker-compose, but when I do this the webapp is not running or not reachable. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Clone the project on Mac OS Execute the README.md's requested INIT_COMMAND='--init' docker-compose up -d Wait for command to finish Web app should be reachable from localhost:8080, but nothing is there
Expected behavior The web app should come up, or we need to clean up the documentation if docker-compose no longer works Screenshots n/a Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Mac OS Catalina Browser Chrome Version - master branch as of todays date
Additional context last lines of output from docker-compose are as follows <denchmark-code>Removing intermediate container 03664b9975b9 ---> cddaaf963684 Step 10/10 : CMD ["label-studio", "start", "my_project", "--init", "--no-browser", "--port", "8080"] ---> Running in 394b0d7f9d48 Removing intermediate container 394b0d7f9d48 ---> ba1dd352e473 Successfully built ba1dd352e473 Successfully tagged label-studio_label-studio:latest WARNING: Image for service label-studio was built because it did not already exist. To rebuild this image you must use `docker-compose build` or `docker-compose up --build`. Creating label-studio ... done </denchmark-code>
I even tried again with another command cited in the readme.. no avail. <denchmark-code>(base) emcp@EMCPs-Mac-mini label-studio % docker-compose up -d WARNING: The INIT_COMMAND variable is not set. Defaulting to a blank string. Recreating label-studio ... done (base) emcp@EMCPs-Mac-mini label-studio %
</denchmark-code>
